abstract: French drug maker Sanofi-Aventis poured cold water on reports it had raised its offer for Genzyme, saying it was sticking to its bid of $18.5 billion, or $69 per share, Reuters reported.
snippet: French drug maker Sanofi-Aventis poured cold water on reports it had raised its offer for Genzyme, saying it was sticking to its bid of $18.5 billion, or $69 per share, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis, the French drug maker, poured cold water on reports it had raised its offer for Genzyme, saying it was sticking to its bid of $18.5 billion, or $69 per share, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Sanofi Stands by Previous Genzyme Offer
